content: this crochet pattern for the caterpillar by sarah quillen creates a soft lovable 13 stuffed animal the terms are us the pattern includes an easy to follow layout with many pictures for reference the pattern is designed for blanket yarn but can also be done in worsted weight yarn with a size f hook and 10mm eyes to create a much smaller caterpillar for this pattern you will need o bernat blanket yarn less than one ball for each color o hook size us k 10 5 / 6 5mm o yarn needle o stitch marker o polyester fiberfill stuffing o 2 safety eyes 15mm
